name: An exquisite platinum ring with emeralds
data: It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users charisma adequately.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It increases the users physical resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users acid resistance a bit.
It increases the users electric resistance a bit.
